Commands Info

.ccp : Character control panel
.online : Shows how many players are online in game
.giran .dion etc : Use this commands to teleport fast
.repair : Use this commands to repair char
.engage : Use this command to marry
.divorce : Use this command to divorce
.gotolove : Use this command to teleport yourself to your love
.openatod : Use this commands to open all Ancient Tome of the Demon
.combinetalismans : Use this commands to Combine Talisman
.aa / .makeaa : Use this commands to trade all Seal Stones
.buffshop : Use this commands to Store char buffs
.dressme : Use this commands to Skins Store
.showdress : Use this commands to View the Skins
.siege : Use this commands to Register Siege
